36struct UWBCoreConfig {

38 uint16_t inter_anchor_delay_us = 1000; // CarroClean: 1000us

40};

46class UWBCore : public core::Modulo {
47public:
48 UWBCore(const UWBCoreConfig& cfg, control::FollowController& follow)
49 : cfg_(cfg), follow_(follow) {}
50
55 bool iniciar() override;
59 void actualizar() override; // toma lectura lista y la pasa al FollowController
60 void detener() override {}
61
62private:
63 UWBCoreConfig cfg_;
64 control::FollowController& follow_;
65
66 // Raw data compartida (simulando el esquema multi-core de CarroClean)
67 volatile UWBRawData raw_{NAN,NAN,NAN,false,false,false,0};
68 volatile bool data_ready_ = false;
69 volatile uint32_t measurement_count_ = 0;
70 SemaphoreHandle_t sem_ = nullptr;
71 TaskHandle_t task_handle_ = nullptr;
72
73 // Anchor DW3000 instances (pines idénticos)
74 DW3000Class a1_{0,4,35};
75 DW3000Class a2_{1,5,27};
76 DW3000Class a3_{2,6,13};
77
81 struct AnchorState {
82 uint16_t consecNotIdle=0;
83 uint16_t consecTimeouts=0;
84 uint16_t consecErrors=0;
85 unsigned long lastSuccessMs=0;
86 uint8_t softResets=0;
87 uint8_t hardResets=0;
88 };
89 AnchorState s1_, s2_, s3_;
90
91 // Task static trampolines
92 static void taskEntry(void* self);
93 void taskLoop();
94
95 // Internos
97 float dsr_once(DW3000Class& D, uint16_t& failCount, unsigned long rxTimeoutMs);
99 void anchor_soft_reinit(DW3000Class& D);
101 void try_anchor_recovery(DW3000Class& D, AnchorState& S, const char* name);
102};
